metadata: (info { (description "Halankola is a race game that was played in seventeenth century South America.") (aliases {"Jalankola" "Hunkuña" "Juncuña" "Halankola" "Halancolatha" "HIlancula"}) (rules "Race game \"resembling backgammon\" played on a board with pichqa die. ") (source "DLP evidence.") (id "1475") (version "1.3.14") (classification "board/war/reconstruction/pending") (credit "Eric Piette") (origin "This game was played in South America, from around 1581 to 1612.") } ) (recon { (concept "Dice" True) (concept "DiceD6" True) })
